data.name: Gnoll
data.description:
The Neutrals - Gnoll [R]
Units:
+10% attack rate
-30% buy cooldown

Buildings:
+20% damage
-5% cost

Upgrades:
+3Lv Melee Weapons

Magic:
Fear (Reduces unit's damage by 25%)
Golem Summon (Summons 1 Mud Golem for 30s)
Agitating Scream (+25% dmg in 600 AoE for 20 sec)

Traits: A very primitive and brutal race, Gnolls thrive in causing as much havoc as possible, while avoiding the big fight. Due to the lack of intelligence among Gnolls, their magic is rather weak, however they compensate for it with their physical power.

Difficulty: Beginer
Created: by Artimenius1307

auras.name: Reconstruction Aura
auras.description:
+1 HP/s building regeneration
(4500 range)

Utility Aura

auras.name: Unholy Aura
auras.description:
+30% move speed, x2 income from neutral buildings
(doesn't affect Shrines)
(4500 range)

Lane Push Aura

auras.name: Endurance Aura
auras.description:
+25% unit attack speed
(1500 range)

Base Defence Aura

bonuses.name: Item Merchant [V]
bonuses.description:
Your heroes will receive a random item for hero kill by them or your units and every 4 level. Items can combine into many combinations. You can sell random items to free up inventory slots.

Type: Hero Power / Economy Boost

bonuses.name: Masters of Ambush [Q]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Ground Slam

Reduces spell damage to Fighter, Poacher, Shaman and Hog Rider by 20% and increases HP by 25 and 2 armor. Your units become invisible.

Type: Anti Magic Damage / Unit Power

bonuses.description:

bonuses.name: Trained War Hogs [S]
bonuses.description:
Unlocked upgrades:
+1 level of Animal Synergy

Gives 30/50/70% chance that Boar will dismount when his Hog Rider is killed. Unmounted Boar has the same damage and health but reduced evasion. It can use Feeding Frenzy and Animal Synergy upgrades.
(can be upgraded inside this building)

Type: Mid Game Push / Unit Power

bonuses.description:
Your units can loot items on kills. Only 1 item per kill.
(upgrades together with Camp Gnoll)

Type: Unit Power

bonuses.name: Kobold Slaves [C]
bonuses.description:
Those little earth dwellers could be of use to us in this war...

Type: Unique Bonus

upgrades.name: Extra Kobolds
upgrades.description:
Add Kobold Warrior to each wave
Kobold Warrior has Crucial Hit (25% to deal 40 extra dmg)

upgrades.name: Sharing Gear
upgrades.description: +4 damage to Kobolds, +2 armor to Kobolds, +20 HP to Kobolds

upgrades.name: Battle Training
upgrades.description:
Kobold Miner gains 10% Stun
Kobold Warrior gains Battle Frenzy 15%

towerUpgrades.name: Animal Synergy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and bonus HP
Affects: Hog Rider and Hawk Rider
(affects summoned Timber Wolves)

Lv1: +8 damage, +25 HP
Lv2: +16 damage, +50 HP
Lv3: +24 damage, +75 HP
Lv4: +32 damage, +100 HP

towerUpgrades.name: Ground Slam
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and stun ability
Affects: Stonecrusher and DeathPaw

Lv1: 100 dmg, 3 sec stun, 350 AoE
Lv2: 150 dmg, 3 sec stun, 350 AoE
Lv3: 200 dmg, 3 sec stun, 350 AoE
Lv4: 250 dmg, 3 sec stun, 450 AoE

towerUpgrades.name: Earth Shield
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: spell shield ability
Affects: Shaman and Sagepaw
(affects organic units only)
(does not affect Special unit)
(works in 350 AoE for Sagepaw)

Lv1: blocks 100 spell damage
Lv2: blocks 125 spell damage
Lv3: blocks 150 spell damage
Lv4: blocks 200 spell damage

towerUpgrades.name: Feeding Frenzy
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: bonus attack rate and 150 HP heal on kill
Affects: Fighter, Hog Rider and Stonecrusher
(10% chance to get -10 armor penalty)

Lv1: +10% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv2: +20% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv3: +30% attack rate for 10 seconds
Lv4: +40% attack rate for 10 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Heavy Ammunition
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: critical hit chance
Affects: Poacher and Savage Tower

Lv1: 15% for 2x damage
Lv2: 20% for 2x damage
Lv3: 25% for 2x damage
Lv4: 40% for 3x damage

towerUpgrades.name: Mockery
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: taunt and bonus armor
Affects: Stonecrusher and Your melee Heroes
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: +15 bonus armor for 8 seconds
Lv2: +20 bonus armor for 8 seconds
Lv3: +25 bonus armor for 8 seconds
Lv4: +30 bonus armor for 8 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Shield Shatter
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: 20% to reduce armor on hit
Affects: Fighter
(affects summoned Mud Golems)
(does not affect Special unit)
(has half duration on Heroes)

Lv1: -5 armor for 4 seconds
Lv2: -7 armor for 6 seconds
Lv3: -9 armor for 8 seconds
Lv4: -12 armor for 10 seconds

towerUpgrades.name: Horrendous Bite
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: damage and slow ability
Affects: Fighter and Hog Rider
(affects organic units only)

Lv1: 50 dmg, 20% slow for 10s
Lv2: 75 dmg, 20% slow for 10s
Lv3: 100 dmg, 20% slow for 10s
Lv4: 125 dmg, 20% slow for 10s

towerUpgrades.name: Toy goes BOOM
towerUpgrades.description:
Gives: AoE damage ability
Affects: Hawk Rider

Lv1: 75 damage in 250 AoE
Lv2: 125 damage in 250 AoE
Lv3: 175 damage in 250 AoE
Lv4: 225 damage in 300 AoE

t1spell.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
t1spell.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

t2spell.name: Flame Traps [X]
t2spell.description:
Ignites prepared pitch traps.
Deals 150 dmg/s for 7 seconds
Cooldown: 300 seconds.

fort.name: Camp Gnoll (Lv1)
fort.description:
Units:
+12% damage

Buildings:
+20% damage

Upgrades:
+2Lv Building Armor

Traits: Basic at a first glance, but actually far more tricky to play. Easy to learn, but difficult to master. Very buff and aura dependent race. Augments troop damage output with blind rage and frenzy.

Difficulty: Skilled

skills.name: Arrow Voley [Z]
skills.description:
Deals 400 damage in 170 AoF.
Cooldown: 50 seconds.

heroes.name: Gnoll Leader
heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Deafening Roar (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 10-22% slow
(250-400 area of effect)
(30 second cooldown)

Slice'n'Dice (Damage Spell)
300-450 dmg, if target dies, +100 dmg, +20% AS
(otherwise gain 15 armor, 30 HP/sec)
(affects organic units only)
(20s duration, 30s cooldown)

Today We Feast! (Support Aura)
18-30% melee lifesteal
(doesn't affect Special unit)

Tough as Nails (Passive Skill)
16-40% to block an attack

skills.name: Deafening Roar - [Level 1]
skills.description: Deals 175 damage to nearby enemy land units and slows their movement by 10% and attack rate by 10%.

skills.name: Poisoned Weapons 1 lvl
skills.description: Deal 600 damage and slow 40% for 15 second.

skills.name: Vampiric Aura - [Level 4]
skills.description: Nearby friendly melee units gain <AUav,DataA4,%>% of their attack damage when they hit enemy units.

skills.name: Heavy Shield - [Level 1]
skills.description: Gives a 16% chance to block an attack.

heroes.description:
Hero Unit (Melee)
Strong Vs All Units
Weak Vs Buildings

Role: Fighter

Can learn:
Shockwave (Damage Spell)
175-325 damage, 2.5-4s stun
(30 second cooldown)

800-2000 dmg to 1 non-Hero unit
(20 second cooldown)

Tasty Meat (Self Spell)
restores 5% HP, 200 MP
(15 second cooldown)

skills.name: Seismic Wave - [Level 1]
skills.description: Sends a wave of force out in a straight line, dealing 250 damage and stunning enemy units for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Bladestorm - [Level 1]
skills.description:
Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around the Hero, rendering him immune to magic and dealing 100 damage per second to nearby enemy land units.
Lasts 5 seconds.

skills.name: Poisoned Weapons 1 lvl
skills.description: Deal 600 damage and slow 40% for 15 second.

skills.name: Dark Spirit - [Level 1]
skills.description: Summons Shadows for 60 seconds.

skills.name: Shockwave - [Level 4]

skills.name: Healing Wave - [Level 4]
